actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Transportation Department.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to study the feasibility of constructing a rail rapid transit line between the West Falls Church, Virginia, station of the Washington, D.C. metrorail system and Dulles International Airport.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to study the feasibility of constructing a rail rapid transit line between the West Falls Church, Virginia, station of the Washington, D.C. Metrorail system and Dulles International Airport in Virginia. Requires a report to Congress on such study within one year after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to study the feasibility of constructing a rail rapid transit line between the West Falls Church, Virginia, station of the Washington, D.C. metrorail system and Dulles International Airport.
